EmailTemplate.description: Sends an email to Dealer Care team to create a PO when parts need to be ordered
EmailTemplate.name: Warranty ERP Parts Needed create PO
EmailTemplate.subject: Warranty ERP Parts Required {!AcctSeed__Project__c.AcctSeedERP__Work_Order_Number__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Please create a PO for this ERP as parts are not in stock.
https://legendboats.lightning.force.com/one/one.app#/sObject/{!AcctSeed__Project__c.Id}/view
